text: Hrabove (; , Grabovo) is a village in Shakhtarsk Raion (district) in Donetsk Oblast of eastern Ukraine. According to the 2001 census, 1,000 people were living there. On 17 July 2014, Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 was shot down and crashed into a field near Hrabove. All 298 people on board died. The flight was meant to go from Amsterdam, Netherlands to Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hrabove, Donetsk Oblast, Shakhtarsk Raion Category:Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 Category:Villages in Ukraine Category:Donetsk Oblast
title: Hrabove, Donetsk Oblast
